component.internal-name: tại sao chọn khóa học en
component.orientation_s: Why should you choose the BA course at DTSVN?

item.text_s: A practical training course with up to 90% of practice sessions helps students "focus on the right knowledge" to become a BA Bank.
Study with leading experts with more than 10+ years of experience in the IT field in the positions of Software Requirements Analysis and Software Testing in Banking.
A dedicated 24/7 support team is always dedicated to bringing the best learning experience to students.
Receive a certificate from the center after completing the training course.
100% free course and 50% support for offline organization fee for the 5 fastest registrants, only 1,500,000 VND.
Have the opportunity to be accepted for an internship and become an official employee at DTSVN.
